stanza.line: Alack what poverty my muse brings (a)forth(/a)
That having such a scope to show her (b)pride(/b)
The argument all bare is of more (a)worth(/a)
Than when it hath my added praise (b)beside(/b)
O blame me not if I no more can (c)write(/c)
Look in your glass and there appears a (d)face(/d)
Dulling my lines and doing me (d)disgrace(/d)
Were it not sinful then striving to (e)mend(/e)
To mar the subject that before was (f)well(/f)
For to no other pass my verses (e)tend(/e)
Than of your graces and your gifts to (f)tell(/f)
And more much more than in my verse can (g)sit(/g)
Your own glass shows you when you look in (g)it(/g)
